code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Admin=()=>{const[users,setUsers]=useState([]);const[tasks,setTasks]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const fetchData=async()=>{const token=localStorage.getItem('token');if(token){const config={headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}};const usersRes=await axios.get('http://kazi-connect.onrender.com/api/admin/users',config);setUsers(usersRes.data);const tasksRes=await axios.get('http://kazi-connect.onrender.com/api/admin/tasks',config);setTasks(tasksRes.data);}};fetchData();},[]);const verifyUser=async id=>{const token=localStorage.getItem('token');const config={headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}};await axios.patch("https://kazi-connect.onrender.com/api/admin/users/".concat(id,"/verify"),{},config);window.location.reload();};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container mx-auto p-8",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-2xl font-bold mb-4",children:"Admin Panel"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"text-xl font-bold mb-2",children:"Users"}),users.map(user=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"border p-4 mb-2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[user.name," - ",user.email," - ",user.role," - Verified: ",user.verified?'Yes':'No']}),!user.verified&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"bg-blue-600 text-white p-2",onClick:()=>verifyUser(user._id),children:"Verify"})]},user._id)),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"text-xl font-bold mb-2",children:"Tasks"}),tasks.map(task=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"border p-4 mb-2",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[task.title," - ",task.status]})},task._id))]});};export default Admin;
